Distribution. Europe, Mt. Caucasus, Transcaucasian area,
Asia Minor
, Iran , Northern Africa.
Remarks. Frequently found in the country from lowlands to highlands. Usually in woodpiles and on recently cut trunks of deciduous trees.

, NI (
Ćurčić et al . 2003
;
Ilić 2005
; Ilić & Ćurčić 2013 ; Ilić et al . 2013 ; this paper).
Distribution. Europe, Russia , Mt. Caucasus, Transcaucasian area, Kazakhstan , Near East.

Remarks. Frequently found in the country. Mostly collected on recently cut trunks of Turkey oak and beech, while sometimes catched in wine traps as well. Found together with
Plagionotus arcuatus
, but not so abundant.
